input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Pedal Mafia"
Reference Product Name: "Core Jersey White/Black"
Reference Product Description:
The all-new Core Jersey is a high-quality staple for cyclists in pursuit of optimal comfort and durability. Our sustainable manufacturing process has evolved to incorporate recycled yarns, while the ultra-soft knitted fabric provides superior durability and form-fitting compression for all body types. Lightweight construction enhances the freedom of movement, and advanced moisture-wicking technology regulates body temperature during intense rides. With three convenient rear pockets and a zipper-secured storage pocket, youâ€™ll have ample space to stow your riding essentials. Arriving in five new colourways, the reimagined CORE Jersey is a must-have addition to your cycling wardrobe.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Pactimo Men's 2021 Lightweight Mesh Cycling Base Layer'
  - Name='Pactimo CCBC M Aeromesh Bike Jersey'
  - Name='Santini Tour de France Yellow Jersey Man'
  - Name='Santini Note Jersey Man'
  - Name='Pro Jersey'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Women's Cycling Pro Jersey'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Nomadic Tech Short Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Core Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Men's Base Layer'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Men's Thermal Cycling Core Vest'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Women's Core Jersey'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Men's 2021 Lightweight Mesh Cycling Base Layer
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a base layer, primarily worn under jerseys, so it differs significantly in function and construction from the Core Jersey, though still cycling apparel.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo CCBC M Aeromesh Bike Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a cycling jersey likely similar in function, lightweight mesh fabric and aerodynamics, making it fairly comparable though brand and materials may vary.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Santini Tour de France Yellow Jersey Man
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Also a cycling jersey designed for performance; however, may target race-specific use and potentially different fabric technology impacting relevancy.
Another cycling jersey likely similar in construction and intended use, with technical features suited for cyclists.
The name suggests a cycling jersey for performance, but no detailed description makes precise comparison difficult; likely relevant but less certain.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Women's Cycling Pro Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and product type (cycling jersey), but women's fit and 'Pro' model which may differ in performance features; still highly relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Nomadic Tech Short Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and product category (cycling jersey), with technical focus; might differ in sleeve length or tech details but closely related.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Core Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different cycling apparel category (bib shorts vs jersey), so low relevancy despite same brand and intended user group.
Base layer is worn under jerseys and differs significantly in material and function from the Core Jersey, though cycling apparel same category.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Men's Thermal Cycling Core Vest
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cycling vest product related to layering and thermal protection; complements but differs in core use from the Core Jersey.
Same brand and product line (Core Jersey) targeted at women, very similar in function, materials, and construction; slight variation due to gender fit.
